title: [Large-Scale] Online Challenge-Based Science Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in 5-member teams using real-time collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace), with time management as a core success factor.

learning_goals: Students can complete team challenge tasks by structuring the scientific problem-solving process into six stages.
Learners can analyze team contributions across three dimensions (individual competence, team collaboration, creativity) by combining peer and self-evaluation.
Participants can improve solution prototypes by performing feedback loops at least three times during the project period.

resources: Online Collaboration Platform (Includes Real-Time Document Editing/Videoconferencing)
Challenge-themed foundational resource packages (videos/summarized papers/case studies)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
